item.title: Amazon is selling a pair of noise-canceling wireless earbuds for just $25
item.description: "I've been using these for 11 months, five days a week, and they're still doing their job perfectly."

item.title: Struggling retailer to sell brand in $1 billion deal amid debt crisis
item.description: The move comes less than a year after the brand's acquisition, as the retailer battles with mounting debt and industry challenges.

item.title: Comcast plans harsh wake-up call for employees as customers flee
item.description: Comcast is quietly planning a harsh workforce change as it rapidly loses customers.

item.title: Macy's is selling 'the softest' lightweight comforter set for $24
item.description: One Macy's shopper said the set was definitely "worth buying."
